overview: Explore Every Contour Of Their Curvaceous Derrieres! Director Kevin Moore has a fetishistic obsession with the female ass, particularly when displayed in shiny, elastic spandex material. In 'Spandex Loads #4,' his latest specialty video for the Buttman Choice line, Kevin and his trusty POV camera showcase the erotic appeal of skintight Lycra leggings. The intimate, one-on-one scenes run the gamut from seductive teasing to explicit hard-core action that compels the director to ejaculate creamy appreciation all over the stretchy fabric molding the butts of his beautiful babes.
title: Spandex Loads 4
